name: Musical Missile Mania
description:
Ah yes, Missile Command, a seminal work in conveyance through mechanics and the best anti-war game of all time. What better way to pay homage to such a masterpiece than by cramming it full of retro aesthetics and a shoehorned musical theme?

A PTBO Game Jam 03 entry.

CONTROLS:

  • qwertyu / zxcvbnm to play C, D, E, F, G, A, B respectively
  • 23567 / sdghj to play C#, D#, F#, G#, A# respectively
  • mouse to aim missile
